title: 200m race

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"When #1 finished 200 m, #2 had finished 160 m, and #3 had finished 120 m."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here is a table of values that shows where the last two runners from the "},{"type":"text","text":"start","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" line are at different key points in time."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"table","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"#2","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"#3","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0 m"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0 m"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"160 m"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"120 m"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"200 m"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Because it is given that the two runners run at a constant rate, and that they both start at the start line (nobody has a head start), the distances of the two runners must be proportionate. Using this, let's solve for x."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{x}{200 \text{ m}}=\dfrac{120 \text{ m}}{160 \text{ m}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=\dfrac{200 \text{ m} \times 120}{160}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=150 \text{ m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus, when #2 crosses the finish line, #3 is 150 m away from the start line, and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{50 m}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" away from the finish line."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let the time taken by the first runner to end the race be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"t"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" seconds"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Speed of first runner "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\frac{200}{t}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Distance covered by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2_{nd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runner in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"t"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" seconds "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=200-40=160m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Speed of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2_{nd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runner "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\frac{160}{t}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Distance covered by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3_{rd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runner in "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"t"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" seconds "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=200-80=120m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Speed of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3_{rd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runner "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\frac{120}{t}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Total time taken by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2_{nd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runner to finish the race "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\frac{Distance}{speed}=20\cancel{0}\times\frac{t}{16\cancel{0}}=\frac{5}{4}t"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Distance covered by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3_{rd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runner during this period of time "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=speed\times time=\frac{120}{\cancel{t}}\times\frac{5}{4}\cancel{t}={150m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Distance between "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2_{nd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3_{rd}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runner "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=200-150=\boxed{50m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Assume the racer who was placed first took "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to finish the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"200m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" race"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Calculating the velocities of the second and third racer, we can see that:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{Racer two's velocity is =} \frac{160m}{8s} = 20ms^{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{Racer three's velocity is =} \frac{120m}{8s} = 15ms^{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{Racer Two}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to finish the race, he should take "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10s"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", as:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"20ms^{-1} × 10s = \boxed{200m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{Racer Three}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" would have then run a distance of:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"15ms^{-1} × 10s = \boxed{150m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, the difference between the running distances of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{racer three}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{racer two}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" when "},{"type":"text","text":"racer two","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" finishes the race is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{50m}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: Dedicated to all moms in the world
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/98a8dca25a.19f49d8526.LIZT2J.jpg?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"
If a dictionary is formed using all possible arrangements of the letters of the word "MOTHER", then the "},{"type":"text","text":"rank","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"text","text":"  of the word "MOTHER" in the dictionary will be?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Details and Assumptions","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here "},{"type":"text","text":"rank","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"text","text":" means at what number the word comes in the dictionary made of all possible arrangements the letters of that particular word."}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Like a normal dictionary, the words are alphabetized from A to Z."}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Try more combinatorics problems."}]}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            "},{"type":"mention","content":[{"type":"text","text":"@Yogesh Ghadge"}],"attrs":[{"profile":"https://brilliant.org/profile/yogesh-f9p1bi/"}]},{"type":"text","text":"  I'll explain it for you. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What we're doing is listing all the arrangements that came before the "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"word 'MOTHER'. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since E came first in the dictionary and there's 5! way to arrange 5 "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"different letters, there's 5! arrangements that begins with letter E "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"and came before MOTHER."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Next, we do this again with the next letters , H. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So we'll get...."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"E_ _ _ _ _ ---> 5!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"H_ _ _ _ _  ---> 5!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ME _ _ _ _ ---> 4! "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"MH _ _ _ _----> 4!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"MOE _ _ _ ----> 3!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"MOH_ _ _ ----> 3!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"MOR_ _ _ -----> 3!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"MOTE_ _ ---->2!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"MOTHER"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So we add them up and get 308."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There's 308 arrangements that came before the word MOTHER so "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the RANK of the word is 309."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I got it wrong because at first I accidentally thought T came before R. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(stupid me :)

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: 200 days streak special 1
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Determine the number of ordered pairs of positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(a,b)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that the least common multiple of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^3\\cdot 5^7 \\cdot 11^{13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}
